and the options will just be ignored", "v0": 1.0 }, { "text": "#p:+50% #r:0% Hello!", "cmd": 0.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 1.0, "vis": 1.0, "ms": 0.0, "sel": 0.0, "dis": 0.0, "xpan": 0.0, "async": 1.0, "extcmd": "Companion: TTS Request", "ext": "SAMMI Bridge" }, { "cmd": 6.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 2.0, "vis": 1.0, "ms": 0.0, "sel": 0.0, "dis": 0.0, "xpan": 96.0, "b0": "TTS Requests' voices can be "Consistent", if provided with a username, 
Companion will keep one of the selected voices for the same user each time,

You can disable this at any time in Companion", "v0": 2.0, "name": "" }, { "b1": "=", "cmd": 15.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 3.0, "vis": 1.0, "ms": 0.0, "sel": 0.0, "dis": 0.0, "xpan": 0.0, "b0": "username_variable", "b2": "'user1234'" }, { "text": "Hello!", "cmd": 0.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 4.0, "key": "username_variable", "vis": 1.0, "ms": 0.0, "sel": 0.0, "dis": 0.0, "xpan": 0.0, "async": 1.0, "extcmd": "Companion: TTS Request (Consistent)", "ext": "SAMMI Bridge" }, { "cmd": 6.0, "obsid": "Main", "pos": 5.0, "vis": 1.0, "ms": 0.0, "sel": 0.0, "dis": 0.0, "xpan": 96.0, "b0": "TTS Requests' voices can be set manually, this command works the same as the first,
